short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is used for debugging FTC bus over IP

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
FTC bus is standard communication based on one wire bus.
This software will transfer all data via TCP socket.
